trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Charlottesville
There were 5 other sightings in Charlottesville on or around February 14th 2013
Summary: Feb 14th Thursday 2013 around 7:00pm, Neighbor Reports a odd light moving over our house.
divs: Sighting DetailsFeb 14th Thursday around 7:00pm 2013, Neighbor calls to report a odd light moving over our home and now is hovering above, running to my room to grab my cam, I run out front to look up and see one big disc I took video and photos when the disc looks to blow apart into four smaller orbs of light, two moved South or S.E. other two moved in the area of south first Street, then a 2nd dark Triangle like a ship came back above the house this time I called six other neighbors that saw this also with me, It looked like a lot of dark blue to white stars very close to each other one neighbor said, Everone else said the dark thing in the sky looked like a Large ship above my home.
